title: ILLA Connects Women Mountain Bikers
content:
ILLA is an adventure networking and planning tool designed for women+, by women. Whether you’re into hiking, skiing, biking, surfing, climbing, or motorsports, our app is the easiest way to find and connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts wherever you are. Check out more below.

Using a user-friendly profile and swipe system, similar to dating apps, ILLA matches you with female friends based on location, outdoor activity, and ability level. Whether you’re into mountain biking, hiking, cycling, skiing, or kayaking, ILLA is a gateway to a community of other female like-minded outdoorspeople.

If you’re working on any stories surrounding beginner mountain biking, or how to make new friends that ride, we’d love to be considered.

Key Features:

  • Explore Nearby Matches: Quickly locate other members who share your outdoor interests, both in your local area and worldwide.
  • Organize Outdoor Adventures: Plan and join outdoor activities with fellow adventurers. Create and share your plans for others to join.
  • Join Events: Explore and join official events organized by ILLA and our partners as well as member and ambassador-led adventures.
  • Build Your Outdoor Profile: Complete your profile to showcase your favorite activities and connect with like-minded adventurers.
  • Real-Time Chat: Discuss upcoming plans, share tips, and stay connected with your adventure community through our chat feature.

App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/illa/id6473451937 – NEW

Price: FREE

The free-to-download app is backed by VF Corporation(VFC) and used across 48 states (and growing). 

 

Visit weareILLA.com for more information.
